description: What is the truth behind Bigfoot sightings and the Bermuda Triangle disappearances? Does anybody really know? These mysteries, among others, are described in the book Believe It or Not? The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze main idea and details and the proper use of adverbs. The book and lesson are also available for levels Y and Z2.
meta: archaeologists, decompose, extraterrestrials, hoax, hover, intricate, microwave, node, pharaoh, plasma, reclusive, retracted

Main Idea and Details : Analyze main idea and details in the story
Suffixes : Identify the meanings of suffixes -ly and -ous
